mapper.select: SELECT t.TRIP_TITLE, jta.JOIN_TRIP_DATE , jta.JOIN_TRIP_CANCEL_YN , jta.JOIN_TRIP_ATTEND_YN , t.TRIP_END_DATE FROM JOIN_TRIP_APPLY jta JOIN `USER` u ON(jta.USER_CODE = u.USER_CODE) JOIN TRIP_REGIST_LIST trl ON(jta.TRIP_REGIST_LIST_CODE = trl.TRIP_REGIST_LIST_CODE) JOIN TRIP t ON(trl.TRIP_CODE = trl.TRIP_CODE) WHERE trl.TRIP_TYPE_CODE = 2 AND jta.USER_CODE = #{id}

SELECT t2.TRIP_TITLE , COUNT(jta2.USER_CODE) as COUNT_USER FROM JOIN_TRIP_APPLY jta2 JOIN TRIP_REGIST_LIST trl2 ON(jta2.TRIP_REGIST_LIST_CODE = trl2.TRIP_REGIST_LIST_CODE) JOIN TRIP t2 ON(trl2.TRIP_CODE = t2.TRIP_CODE) WHERE trl2.TRIP_TYPE_CODE = 2 AND jta2.USER_CODE = #{id} GROUP BY t2.TRIP_TITLE

SELECT TT.TRIP_TITLE , jta.JOIN_TRIP_DATE , u.USER_NAME , gt.G_TRIP_PAYMENT , pa.PAYMENT , jta.JOIN_TRIP_CANCEL_YN , jta.JOIN_TRIP_ATTEND_YN , TT.TRIP_END_DATE , tr.TRIP_REVIEW_CODE , jta.TRIP_REGIST_LIST_CODE FROM TRIP TT JOIN GUIDE_TRIP gt ON(TT.TRIP_CODE = gt.TRIP_CODE) JOIN TRIP_REGIST_LIST trl ON(TT.TRIP_CODE = trl.TRIP_CODE) JOIN JOIN_TRIP_APPLY jta ON(trl.TRIP_REGIST_LIST_CODE = jta.TRIP_REGIST_LIST_CODE) JOIN PAY_APPLY pa ON(jta.JOIN_TRIP_APPLY_CODE = pa.JOIN_TRIP_APPLY_CODE) JOIN TRIP_REVIEW tr ON(jta.JOIN_TRIP_APPLY_CODE = tr.JOIN_TRIP_APPLY_CODE) JOIN `USER` u ON(trl.USER_CODE = u.USER_CODE) WHERE trl.TRIP_TYPE_CODE = '1' AND u.USER_CODE = #{id}

SELECT t.TRIP_TITLE , jta.JOIN_TRIP_DATE , jta.JOIN_TRIP_CANCEL_YN , jta.JOIN_TRIP_ATTEND_YN , t.TRIP_END_DATE FROM TRIP_REGIST_LIST trl JOIN TRIP t ON(trl.TRIP_CODE=t.TRIP_CODE) JOIN JOIN_TRIP_APPLY jta ON(trl.TRIP_REGIST_LIST_CODE = jta.TRIP_REGIST_LIST_CODE) JOIN `USER` u ON(trl.USER_CODE = u.USER_CODE) WHERE trl.TRIP_TYPE_CODE ='2' AND u.USER_CODE = #{id}

SELECT t2.TRIP_TITLE , COUNT(jta2.USER_CODE) as COUNT_USER FROM JOIN_TRIP_APPLY jta2 JOIN TRIP_REGIST_LIST trl2 ON(jta2.TRIP_REGIST_LIST_CODE = trl2.TRIP_REGIST_LIST_CODE) JOIN TRIP t2 ON(trl2.TRIP_CODE = t2.TRIP_CODE) JOIN `USER` u ON(trl2.USER_CODE = u.USER_CODE) WHERE trl2.TRIP_TYPE_CODE = '2' AND u.USER_CODE = #{id} GROUP BY t2.TRIP_TITLE

SELECT TT.TRIP_TITLE , jta.JOIN_TRIP_DATE FROM TRIP TT JOIN GUIDE_TRIP gt ON(TT.TRIP_CODE = gt.TRIP_CODE) JOIN TRIP_REGIST_LIST trl ON(TT.TRIP_CODE = trl.TRIP_CODE) JOIN JOIN_TRIP_APPLY jta ON(trl.TRIP_REGIST_LIST_CODE = jta.TRIP_REGIST_LIST_CODE) WHERE trl.TRIP_TYPE_CODE = '3' AND jta.USER_CODE = #{id}
SELECT USER_CODE , USER_NAME , USER_PHONE , USER_PWD , USER_BDAY , USER_GENDER FROM 'USER' u WHERE u.USER_CODE = #{id}
SELECT e.EXAMINE_REQUEST_REASON , e.EXAMINE_REQUEST_YN , e.EXAMINE_REQUEST_DATE FROM EXAMINE e WHERE e.TYPE_CODE IN (2,5) AND e.EXAMINE_REQUEST_FROM = #{id}

SELECT ti.INQUIRY_REASON , ti.INQUIRY_YN FROM TRIP_INQUIRY ti JOIN TRIP_REGIST_LIST trl ON(ti.TRIP_REGIST_LIST_CODE = trl.TRIP_REGIST_LIST_CODE) JOIN TRIP t ON(trl.TRIP_CODE = t.TRIP_CODE) JOIN `USER` u ON(ti.USER_CODE = u.USER_CODE) WHERE u.USER_CODE = #{id}
SELECT JOIN_TRIP_APPLY_CODE FROM JOIN_TRIP_APPLY jta JOIN TRIP_REGIST_LIST trl ON(jta.TRIP_REGIST_LIST_CODE = trl.TRIP_REGIST_LIST_CODE) WHERE jta.USER_CODE = #{id} AND trl.TRIP_REGIST_LIST_CODE = 20
